Happy New Year from the Clouvider team, all the best and hope its a great year for everyone!

What sets us apart?
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse, redundant routing.
-Great peering at LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX, DE-CIX and all major local ISP’s.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA, ZAYO and Cogent which guarantees excellent, congestion free connectivity.
-LINX, LONAP, AMS-IX & DE-CIX partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-EU MPLS Network Spread over 7 datacenters.
-Tier 3 Datacentres in London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established UK based business. We just turned 6!

So where are the offers?
Current offers can be seen at https://www.clouvider.co.uk/dedicated-servers-sale , subject to availability. If it’s not listed its gone!

FAQ’s:

Can these servers be customised?
Yes, we have several options during the checkout process for our Xeon E- systems. If you seek a different configuration please contact us.

Can I check your network?
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at https://as62240.net/, alternatively you can use the following test IP’s:
185.42.223.63 - London, UK
194.127.172.33 - Amsterdam, NL
91.199.118.14 - Frankfurt, DE

How long for deployment?
Our standard delivery is within 3 working days, non-stocked custom configurations may take longer.

Do you offer IPv6?
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

What about BGP?
Yes, this can be requested during the order process and will be manually configured by our network team.

Can I bring my own subnets?
Yes, this can be requested during the order process, we require valid route records where applicable.

Can you accommodate x, y or z?
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, we are happy to help where possible.

Any questions or queries?
Contact our team today at https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/ .

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regrettably be cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard Terms & Conditions https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions. Cancellation notice period applies.
